“SVMA is a unique cultural asset that brings art, artists, lectures, and art instruction to the Sonoma Community. The Museum provides a sophisticated, global fine art experience and all one has to do is walk through the front doors and enjoy the ever changing year-round exhibitions. ”
— Kevin W. McNeely

Also At SVMA

Education
School Tours
The Museum welcomes school and camp groups year-round. SVUSD students K-12 and their teachers are admitted free and can experience the current exhibition on a self-guided visit, or when booked in advance, with a Museum Guide.
all education
